pr_title: SE Config can be created from MP Config

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we could add some disableMutableSources or something similar in the future
timeline.author: danielkec

timeline.bodyText: Can we assert those resolved PATH values equals with System.getenv("PATH")?
timeline.author: danielkec

replies.bodyText: Using custom env var, validating content.
replies.author: tomas-langer

timeline.bodyText: Failing on windows java.util.NoSuchElementException: Property "path" is not available in configuration
timeline.author: danielkec

replies.bodyText: Using an env var configured in pom.xml now.
replies.author: tomas-langer

timeline.author: danielkec

replies.bodyText: Fixed all instances to work the same - if loader is null, use context class loader.
replies.author: tomas-langer

timeline.message:
MP to SE config now works including environment variables.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Unused fields removed
Empty config now does not create an executor service.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Only mapper services enabled for mapper config.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Using the same classloader when null is sent in MP config.
Added env var test.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Using the same classloader when null is sent in MP config.
Added env var test.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Ensure the reference config uses its own configuration (intermitent failure fix)

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>
